description.0: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, and other useful items in its sheath.

0.0: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores <cryo>1%</cryo> HP.

1.0: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores <cryo>1.25%</cryo> HP.

2.0: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores <cryo>1.5%</cryo> HP.

3.0: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores <cryo>1.75%</cryo> HP.

4.0: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores <cryo>2%</cryo> HP.
